scripts.build: tsc -p ./tsconfig.lib.json --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && tsc -p ./tsconfig.lib.json -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.build:dev: yarn run build-renderer:wasm:dev && yarn run build-compiler:wasm:dev && yarn run build-wrapper:dev
scripts.build-renderer: yarn run build-renderer:wasm && yarn run build-wrapper
scripts.build-compiler: yarn run build-compiler:wasm && yarn run build-wrapper
scripts.build-compiler:dev: yarn run build-compiler:wasm:dev && yarn run build-wrapper:dev
scripts.link:local: yarn link:renderer && yarn link:compiler && yarn link @myriaddreamin/typst-ts-renderer @myriaddreamin/typst-ts-web-compiler && yarn link && npm link
